questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) decorative object and clock
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A decorative object on a shelf

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A decorative object
C) A landscape
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A clock
B) A plant
C) A painting
D) A piece of furniture

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Trees and sky
B) A wall and a shelf
C) A crowd of people
D) A body of water

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A table
B) A decorative object
C) A window
D) A vehicle

What is the shape of the decorative object?
A) Circular
B) Triangular
C) Rectangular
D) Face-shaped

What colors are prominent on the decorative object?
A) Blue and green
B) Red and black
C) Gold, white, and silver
D) Pink and purple

What feature is incorporated into the decorative object?
A) A mirror
B) A clock
C) A light
D) A photograph

What time does the clock on the decorative object show?
A) 3:00
B) 6:00
C) 9:00
D) 12:05

What is the background color of the wall?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White
D) Yellow

What other object is visible in the photo?
A) A book
B) A plant
C) A grater
D) A lamp

What is the orientation of the decorative object?
A) Lying flat
B) Hanging on the wall
C) Standing upright
D) Leaning against something

What does the decorative object resemble?
A) An animal
B) A human face
C) A vehicle
D) A building

What is the position of the clock on the decorative object?
A) At the top
B) At the bottom
C) In the middle
D) On the side

What does the clock face display?
A) Roman numerals
B) Arabic numerals
C) No numbers
D) Digital numbers

What is the dominant color of the shelf?
A) Black
B) White
C) Brown and white
D) Grey

What is the relationship between the clock and the decorative object?
A) The clock is separate from the object
B) The clock is embedded in the object
C) The clock is hanging above the object
D) The clock is placed beside the object

What is the background color of the clock face?
A) Black
B) White
C) Blue
D) Red

What is the condition of the shelf?
A) Clean and organized
B) Dusty and cluttered
C) Broken and damaged
D) Empty

What is the relationship between the decorative object and the grater?
A) They are part of a set
B) They are unrelated items
C) They are both clocks
D) They are both kitchen tools

What is the angle of the photo taken?
A) From above
B) From below
C) Straight on
D) From the side

What type of clock is embedded in the decorative object?
A) Digital
B) Analog
C) Sundial
D) Cuckoo

What is the shape of the object in the center?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Triangular
D) Face-shaped
